Ahmad Ibraheem Ilu is an Economist and a Policy Researcher at the Nigerian Economic Summit Group (NESG). Ahmad Ilu is passionate on specializing in research on Macroeconomic Models such as DSGE-based models, Financial Economics, Monetary Economics, Applied Econometrics, and Islamic Economics. My extensive knowledge and experience have enabled me to participate in interviews on various live TV programs, where I analyze and discuss contemporary Macroeconomic issues, financial markets, and monetary and fiscal policies.
I am proficient in the use of various:

• Document Preparation Software:
Microsoft Word, PowerPoint, Excel, Latex, and R Markdown 

• Statistical software tools: 
(R & RStudio), Python, EViews, STATA, Matlab, and Dynare.
